projects.name: Quick List
projects.description: Fullstack React and NodeJS app that utilizes Auth0 for a user login experience, Heroku to host the backend server, and MongoDB to store user data.
projects.note: need to fix readme location and make backend code available

projects.name: Amusement Park Site
projects.description: Large vanilla HTML CSS JS website advertising indoor amusement park. Everything is custom built.

projects.name: Voting Queue
projects.description: Data is processed as voters from an input document to an output document. Uses OOP, general data types, data structure.

projects.name: Quotes Web Application
projects.description: Full stack Php web application with login and CRUD operations on quotes. Live demo coming soon.

projects.name: Stocks Desktop App
projects.description: Uses wxPython, a local db, and an API to compare current stock holdings against current prices as a desktop app

projects.name: Employee Info Web App
projects.description: Uses Bottle framework to perform CRUD operations on local db allowing hours to be edited and pay to be calculated

projects.name: Volunteers Desktop App
projects.description: Desktop app built using Java and JavaFx that allows CRUD operations on linked list. Uses OOP and generics.

projects.name: Website Sessions
projects.description: Php web app that uses sessions to store cookie data in browser. Live demo coming soon

projects.name: This Site
projects.description: This site was built with React and a local db of projects info.
